unalcol.descriptors

Class Descriptors<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.descriptors.Descriptors<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of objects to be described.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DescriptorsWrapper

    public abstract class Descriptors<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Descriptors

    Obtains a set of real value descriptors for a given object.

    Source code is available.

    • Method Detail

      • descriptors

        public abstract double[] descriptors(T obj)
        Obtains the descriptors of (an array of double values describing) an object.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be described using double values (features).
        Returns:
        An array of double values used for describing the object.

      • get

        public static Descriptors<?> get(java.lang.Object owner)
        Obtains the descriptor service associated to a given object.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object to be described.
        Returns:
        Descriptor service associated to a given object.

      • set

        public static boolean set(java.lang.Object owner,
                          Descriptors<?> service)
        Associates to a given object owner its descriptor service.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that will be associated to the descriptors service.
        service - Descriptors service used by the object owner.
        Returns:
        If the owner was associated to the descriptors service.

      • obtain

        public static double[] obtain(java.lang.Object obj)
        Obtains the descriptors of an object.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be described
        Returns:
        An array of double values used for describing the object.
